name: 射就完事儿了消灭蔬菜
name_original: 射就完事儿了消灭蔬菜
description:
Shooting is finished. It’s a shooting game. Players need to move around to shoot monsters in all directions.
After the touch, the character will lose blood. Initially it is three bloodstains. The monster has no active skills. After touching the character, the character will lose its health.
After hitting the monster, the monster will have a certain chance to drop all kinds of props, get invincible skills, the player can get started with the game faster.
The game will explode after killing the monster, and the resulting particle effect will affect the player's perspective.
Players need to constantly avoid shooting to enter the next level
